Columbus.Columbus Metropolitan Airport: Columbus Airport (IATA: CSG, ICAO: KCSG, FAA LID: CSG) formerly known as the Columbus Metropolitan Airport is a public use airport located three nautical miles (6 km) northeast of the central business district of Columbus, a city in Muscogee County, Georgia, United States. It is owned by the Columbus Airport Commission. Serving Georgia's second largest city, it is Georgia's fourth busiest airport.
